requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer, or another modern 64-bit Linux distribution (e.g., Fedora, Arch)
  • Processor: Dual-core, dual-threaded CPU (e.g., Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or AMD Radeon Vega 3 or better (Mesa 20.0+ recommended)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan support or OpenGL 3.3 compatibility

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750, AMD Radeon HD 7770, or better (Proprietary or Mesa drivers recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan support or OpenGL 4.5 compatibility
